common

Interface IChatRoom

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ChatRoom, ServerChatRoom

    public interface IChatRoom
extends java.io.Serializable
    A generalized chat room interface that defines a set of operations of a chat room. A chat room is a FULLY SERIALIZABLE object that is wholly transmitted from one machine to another machine A chat room holds a set of IReceiver stubs.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean addIReceiverStub(IReceiver receiver)
      Add a receiver in the local chat room without interacting with remote peers
      java.util.Collection<IReceiver> getIReceiverStubs()
      Get all receivers' stubs in the chat room at the moment the method is called
      java.lang.String getName()
      Get the name of the chat room
      java.util.UUID getUUID()
      Get UUID of this chat room, which is an unique identifier for this chat room
      boolean removeIReceiverStub(IReceiver receiver)
      Remove a receiver in the local chat room without interacting with remote peers
      <T extends ICRMessageType>
      void      		 sendPacket(DataPacketCR<T> data)
      Send a data packet to everyone in the chat room asynchronously.

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        java.lang.String getName()
        Get the name of the chat room
        Returns:
        The name of the chat room

      • getUUID

        java.util.UUID getUUID()
        Get UUID of this chat room, which is an unique identifier for this chat room
        Returns:
        UUID of this chat room

      • getIReceiverStubs

        java.util.Collection<IReceiver> getIReceiverStubs()
        Get all receivers' stubs in the chat room at the moment the method is called
        Returns:
        All the receivers' stubs in the chat room at the moment.

      • sendPacket

        <T extends ICRMessageType> void sendPacket(DataPacketCR<T> data)
        Send a data packet to everyone in the chat room asynchronously. This method should send the data packet asynchronously, i.e. delegates the sending process into a new thread. The possible status will be returned in an asynchronous way, which will be processed by the receiver.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of the data being held.
        Parameters:
        data - The data packet to be sent

      • addIReceiverStub

        boolean addIReceiverStub(IReceiver receiver)
        Add a receiver in the local chat room without interacting with remote peers
        Parameters:
        receiver - the receiver to add
        Returns:
        False if the receiver is already in the chat room; True if successfully add the receiver

      • removeIReceiverStub

        boolean removeIReceiverStub(IReceiver receiver)
        Remove a receiver in the local chat room without interacting with remote peers
        Parameters:
        receiver - the receiver to remove
        Returns:
        False if the receiver is actually not in the chat room; True if successfully remove the receiver
